Package com.bsuuv.grocerymanager.ui.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CameraUtil
    Utility class responsible for operations related to capturing and saving an image.
    FoodItemCreationRequirementChecker
    Utility class containing logic to check that given food-item properties fit their requirements.
    FoodItemListDifferenceCalculator
    Utility class for mutating one list of FoodItems to another efficiently.
    ImageViewPopulater
    Utility class for populating ImageViews using Glide.
    PluralsProvider
    Utility class for creating certain strings of the app that require plural forms.
    RecyclerViewUtil
    Utility class for repeating RecyclerView related tasks.
    RequestValidator
    Utility class for intepreting results of different kinds of Activity-related requests.
    WeekdaySorter
    Comparator for sorting weekdays.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FoodItemCreationRequirementChecker.RequirementNotMetException
